website_summaries.verdict: For tough lenses and frames that will last, go with these Dudumas.
pros: Customers love the clear lenses and tough frame design
Features UV400 protection and seven layers to prevent scratches and shattering
Polarized lenses offer reliable protection against wind, dust, and gravel
cons: Some customers found these glasses on the smaller side

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: They fit my nose really well there soft on the bridge of my nose and lightweight on my face i honestly cant tell the difference between these and my husbands oakleys i like them just as much
customer_reviews.author: Lillylover

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I've only had these glasses for about two days, but I love them. They fit great, and my head is somewhat large. They don't feel like flimsy or cheap plastic, and the clarity is amazing. They are definitely polarized and seem to block out harmful sunlight. I would give 4 stars, honestly, if they were not backed by a lifetime warranty. These glasses most likely won't last more than a year or two, but you can replace them when they break. And they're not too cheaply built. Money back guarantee, you can't go wrong. 4 stars for quality, extra star for warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Adarbonne

customer_reviews.title: You Look Marvelous
customer_reviews.text: You will look and feel cool in these excellent 20 dollars shades. Near perfect fit , lightweight and slightly smaller size lenses which look better than sunglasses that are too large.. Lots of UV protection. Sold with bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cillford

customer_reviews.title: Why my favorites?
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn polarized GRAY lenses. [since 1963]. Have occasionally tried yellow lenses. No. Too weird. WHY I AM NOW WEARING THESE? The coating looks like you would be seeing everything in yellow. Not true. The lenses are gray, it's the COATING that's yellow, and REFLECTS colors you don't want without seeming to change the colors you see. I CAN'T explain why, but these are my favorite glasses now. For some reason, every time I have to choose a pair, THESE ARE THE ONES I PICK subconsciously. VERY happy.
customer_reviews.author: Friday Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely my favorite pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Other buyers stated that the glasses seem to fit kind of tight and I would agree, however, they are without a doubt the best glasses I have ever owned especially considering the price. If I ever have reason to reorder these I most likely order multiple pairs so as to leave them in all vehicles and house. My wife says they do not look as nice as the Oakley's I had before they were stolen but I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Celek

customer_reviews.title: Update to “Good fit, clear, undistorted, love these” But they do not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Since May of 2018, i have purchased 5 pairs of these sunglasses, the seller also replaced 2 pair under warranty for a total of 7 pairs. The frames have cracked and broken on all but one pair that has not been used up until now. The seller is now giving me flack over further replacements, in any case it does not matter that much as I will not buy these again nor recommend them or this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for my daughter who plays tennis. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter who plays tennis. She loves them. They stay put while she's on the court and gives her sun and glare protection.
customer_reviews.author: sturgeon1603

customer_reviews.title: Real happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: They're sunglasses. They do a great job of blocking out the sunlight. The glasses fit snug on the face. The only place they don't block are the lower edge of the lenses and the farthest extremity on both sides. I have wrap around suglasses that don't let any unfiltered sunlight in. Almost like goggles. But they are bulky. These do pretty much the same job with a fraction of the weight and size. The carry case is a nice touch. With the suglasses inside I can throw it in a carrying bag, without concern of crushing or scratching the glasses. Would definitely buy again if I lost these.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Orlow

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-use sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: After losing $180 pair of wrap-around Raybans used daily and breaking my tinted safety glasses I use for working in yard, I picked these up as a short-term fix to address both purposes. After breaking-in (initially tight), they've worked out great. I have also used them on long-distance runs (including the 2nd half of a marathon), fit is great/comfortable. Great product, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Powers

customer_reviews.title: they do the job, but weird odor at first
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned Under Armour sunglasses, but after leaving them out in the heat and they subsequently melted at the nose piece, I decided to not spend a bunch of money on sunglasses again. These have been great so far. I am not into intense sports, but they have done the job for light running, walking, and chasing after a toddler. I didn't deduct a star, but I do want to say that when I first got them, they had an odor--like cigarette smoke. I had to leave them outside for about 3 days in order to get rid of the order. After that, they have been fine.
customer_reviews.author: missmatch

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Work great
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased numerous sun glasses over the past few years. Several off Amazon which I do the vast majority of my shopping. I have to say these are my favorite glasses yet. They fit great. Wrap around so really block out the sun well. No sun glasses are perfect but I'd give these more than 5 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Vermonter

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I have paid very good money for Oakley Sunglasses which I have never had a problem with but I needed another pair for driving and didn't want to spend so much. These are great, light weight and have the perfect amount of shading which provides very clear views. I was very impressed with how secure the nose piece is also. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sunglasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses! I bought them for my husband who has to have sunglasses all the time yet he's really good at breaking them. He's managed to break name brand frames and I can't keep paying those high prices. So I got him these and the unbreakable frames are a huge plus! He really likes these sunglasses too!
customer_reviews.author: Carla M. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic for the price. I've had mine for a little more than a year and there are no scratches at all. One of the lenses has a short crack at the side where the arm is attached but they still work great and the crack is outside my field of view. Still not enoough to lower my review to four stars. I'lll be ordering another pair when I lose or break mine.
customer_reviews.author: Animator geek

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I play a lot of tennis and sweat heavily. These glasses were the perfect fit and do not slide down my nose. The bows fit snug to the sides for a great, tight fit. They will fog some, but a quick release from the Briggs of my nose and the problem goes away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis fan

customer_reviews.title: For the price, you can't beat these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can't beat these sunglasses. I've worn name brand for years and thought I'd try something different rather than $90 replacement lenses. This is now the 4th pair of these I've ordered, not because they didn't last, but because both of my sons wanted them too. I also had an opportunity to work with their customer service. My most recent order failed to ship with the soft case and cleaning cloth. When I contacted them with my order number, they were quick to apologize, confirm my address and provide me with tracking information for the shipment.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hoag

customer_reviews.title: They stay firm on your face
customer_reviews.text: I run 5 miles every day and I have gone through countless pairs of expensive running glasses. These are very comparable to any $300 dollar pair I have ever purchased. I am using a hard case of my own because I keep them in my gym bag. I also still use my Maui Jims for daily use. But, for running and excercising and the price these sunglasses are excellent. Last note: They do not move off the bridge of my nose or my ears. This is such a blessing for runners. Thank you and nice work. Rick
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: These glasses held up and were really great in keeping the sun brightness to an acceptable level
customer_reviews.text: Recently went on a 3 week trip that required a lot of hiking and swimming. These glasses held up and were really great in keeping the sun brightness to an acceptable level. Seems pretty sturdy as kids like to grab glasses and smack you in the head in attempt to put them on. They held up. Really great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D3athScyth3002

customer_reviews.title: Fragile lens
customer_reviews.text: Lens is very delicate and very sharp/jagged when it breaks. Was going to use for riding but no way now, if you have any chance of a slight impact with these then look elsewhere if you don't want your face cut up
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sunglasses Cut the Glare While Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: Sunglasses come with a protective case and pouch, fit pretty snugly on my face and give you that sharp contrast against the blinding sun. Really a nice blue color too that changes a little as you reflect the light off them. Seems to be holding up pretty well after a few months. Just take care of them and they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Belmont

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for an inexpensive price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for an inexpensive price. I compared these to other polarized sun glasses I own, by looking at clouds in front of the sun. The difference was dramatic. I could see much more detail with the Duduma brand. I considered buying Oakleys, but I could not justify the price considering they cost as much as my table saw I just bought. The Duduma's also have UV400 protection and with the wrap around style, they keep side sun from reflecting in and bouncing off the back of the front lens in the early morning or at sunset.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T. Rakosky

customer_reviews.title: love these, fit great.
customer_reviews.text: love these, fit great, cover your whole line of sight and are polarized so great for fishing.. cheap, but not cheaply made, so not fearful of what i'm doing while wearing them, easy and cheaply replaced if broken. will stick with this over the WAY more expensive glasses that do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Kothon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value, would purchase these again in a heart beat
customer_reviews.text: I exclusively wear Maui Jim's but wanted a cheap pair of glasses that I could be a little rougher with and not worry about losing a multi hundred dollar set of glasses. These frames feel cheap, because they are. But the lenses and glasses function perfectly for what I want them for which is cycling ~650 miles a month. I will definitely say that these are excellent value. If value is the primary consideration, you honestly might find these hard to beat. I think they're ugly but I got them because I needed the functionality. Anyway, definitely great as a second or auxiliary pair of glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Scumquistador

customer_reviews.title: Good for outside men
customer_reviews.text: My dad lovesss these! Great quality, I surprised him and ordered these and he said "I've never had a good pair of sunglasses before!" Hes always buying glasses from the drug store and I think these will be a great substitution for him. He's a landscaper and these really cover the whole side panels of the face, so they also give a good amount of protection as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lexis Sell

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike here. They're very stylish glasses. Was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robbyn

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and durable shades
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my vacation in Maui, Hawaii, and they've worked out well. I can be tough on sunglasses and didn't want to bring an expensive pair while traveling. The Dudumas are comfortable, durable and the lenses work great - love the polarized lenses when you're on the water. They also look great on me, in my humble opinion. The hard-shell case, cleaning cloth and cloth bag to store them are all a wonderful bonus. I would recommend these and will be buying more Dudumas!
customer_reviews.author: Valentine Bologna

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a hard to buy for hubby. Very comfortable. Had to send the first pair I ordered(different brand) back. These I highly recommend and will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses.  Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased oakley’s and these about the same time. I should have just got more of these. The oakley’s are nice but not $150 nicer. The polarized lenses take some getting used to. The make my phone look funny at times. But, polarized lenses can do that. Definitely would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: risky

customer_reviews.title: I generally hate cheap polarized sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Now that I've had these a couple weeks, I figured it's time for a review. I generally hate cheap polarized sunglasses. Car windows get these weird moire patterns in them which makes it annoying while driving. That effect is very minimal with these. The frame feels incredibly durable compared to other glasses I've bought in this price range. They fit nicely. The lenses do as they should: make it easier on the eyes in the sun. If you need a good pair of sunglasses that won't drain your bank account, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: GuyFlannigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Shades, way better than all I've tried online so far
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic!! I had a pair of the Blu-blocker Viper (grey lens) before which had been my favorite for years but got discontinued. These are very very close - enough to easily be my new favorite, cheaper too. Colors remain true, no colored tint, crisp resolution, not too dark. No flaws detected, solid construction. The nose piece is adjustable, not glued to the lens. Stays on the face, the hinges are firm feeling. I have this and the black frame/blue lens version, which visually is the same - very nice. If maintaining/enhancing your visibility under the sun is the goal, then I would definitely try these.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Best sunglasses ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Polarized lenses are MUCH easier on the eyes in terms of glare elimination than standard lenses. The frames look very cool and they are comfortable. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Henri P. Merceron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price.  VERY satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. This one compares to a lot of the more expensive glasses out there. I run, kayak, and ride bicycle with it with no issues and clear vision. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of work sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as his work sunglasses, they cover the whole eye area around to the side on the face which is perfect for him. They came with a case, which I didn’t realize they would, and he’s very happy about that because his old work glasses would get so scratched up in his backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Alannah Michalski

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was described, with better quality than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses look exactly as in the picture, and fit very comfortably on the face. To make things better, they are the only sports glasses I have found so far, that don't make me look like a bug! These also come with a nice microfiber cloth, a cool little sunglasses bag, and a hard case that seems to be of good quality. Although I'm not sure why both a hard case and a small bag case are needed, I'm not complaining for the extra gear, especially at the low price these sell at.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin W.

customer_reviews.title: great suglasses
customer_reviews.text: fits well and are strong and durable I love the way they look on my head. the price is good for these. fashionel. they will stay on your head while playing sports. light weight so good for sports.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy f

customer_reviews.title: Durable Duduma
customer_reviews.text: I’ve got 4 pair & have owned others in the past. These glasses are durable & sturdy - casual, golf, jet skis, driving. Comfortable fit. Only ones I’ve broken have either been sat on or driven over.
customer_reviews.author: Roman One

customer_reviews.title: great shades
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal, and perfect for the outdoorsman. I love saltwater fishing, and these are polarized, lightweight, and very comfortable....and only $20!!! I will buy more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Mark R.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking good quality
customer_reviews.text: Son loves them. He is an ocean fisherman but he wears them everywhere. Getting polarized for about $20 feels like a bargain
customer_reviews.author: Easy going

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service. Glasses fell off while mountain bike riding. The lens cracked from the fall. Dudama replaced them free of charge! Going to order another pair to have around. Given my propensity to lose or drop glasses, the price is right for these sunglasses, and the warranty is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: John Seward

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality sun glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife because of the high reviews. Most both sex sunglasses are too big for her but these fit her and myself perfectly and they are extremely light weight. They also very clear and having Polaroid lens cut the glare. She loves them and I bought a pair for myself. The only negative was that they were misdirected during shipment and we received later than promised.
customer_reviews.author: Ravenlincoln

customer_reviews.title: Good polarization, doesn't scratch from normal cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Clearer vision, good polarization, seems to be holding up well both physically and lenses not scratching up from regular cleaning with a t-shirt. I like the way they look on me, and I like the way things look when looking thru them. I highly recommend them and would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike H

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: You will love this sunglasses like I do Really good quality hope will last as it seems
customer_reviews.author: elmer a perez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cycling Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: They are light, polarized and come with a case and microfiber cloth. They do feel a little bit tight, to weak them causally, but perfect for any athletic activity.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ericson

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous sun glasses. I had to have cataract surgery and needed sunglasses afterwards. I ordered this ahead of time and love them. My vision has never been better and this sunglasses are a must. Would order again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.author: Mr watson

customer_reviews.title: They’ve got an odor?!?
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and while the fit and lenses are good, the sunglasses have a weird odor. It’s on the frame and it’s more noticeable on the sides, I presume because your head sweats and the smell gets carried around then. So is it inferior plastic or is it something leeching out of the plastic that I’m now absorbing into my skin and brain. Not very comfortable with that! I tried washing them to see if that would get the smell out but that didn’t help at all. These are going back ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: ChicagoDave

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these sunglasses! They are comfortable on the bridge of my nose, they stay snug while running and the polarized lenses are great. Since I lose sunglasses from time to time, the cost makes these a good value and good performance for all types of activities.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Benson

customer_reviews.title: Best buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits well , guards sides of eyes from sun and wind. Flexible yet sturdy , don’t have to worry about dropping them. Polarized , vision excellent. Already bought one for myself and my daughter .
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great shades, great price.
customer_reviews.text: I think these are a great pair of shades for the price. I am a sunglass snob, and own a few pairs of both Ray Bans and Oakleys.. but i wanted a less expensive pair of shades for more rugged excursions. These shades are tough. The lenses are very clear and they fit my face very comfortably. Ive worn them biking, hiking and have spent a few days with them on the beach and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Warranty honored no problem!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, like the look, most importantly the warranty! After about a month, a small crack developed at the top of the frame...I emailed them with my order # and issue, they got back to me quickly without hesitation to replace, and they even gave me the option to change styles of I wanted. Nice to see a company actually honor their warranty that they claim, no shipping charges either! Extremely happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses and durable and they even look good! I am always on the lookout for orange, polarized glasses because they seem to enhance contrast better than the blue glasses. They smelled a bit funny for awhile, probably the factory molding process, but it eventually went away.
customer_reviews.author: SierraQ

customer_reviews.title: Good Polarized Sports Sunglasses at a Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were just as described and are perfect for running, fishing and other outdoor sports. I don't believe that they are rated impact-resistant, but the lenses are shatter-proof. The lenses are distortion-free and the glasses are comfortable to wear. Nice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: GLP_Florida

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses protecting the eyes against UV indexes, perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses protecting the eyes against UV indexes, perfectly. Off course, they are for outdoor, you don't need them for indoor.They are horizontally rectangular, and a little curved longitudinally, meaning they cover the entire length of your eyes.Beside,they are offered by amazon .com, ,meaning they are competitive. What else you wanted....
customer_reviews.author: Fred F. Arzideh

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great for the price, I’ve only wore them for 3 days but they are yet to scratch. They are darker than my last pair which I prefer and the polarization is up to par. I’m looking to buy more
customer_reviews.author: The guy who bought this

customer_reviews.title: A great buy. I was surprised to see my glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: A great buy. I was surprised to see my glasses come with a little bag and a case to put them in. The glasses are great too. I am glad I bought these glasses and when I need more I will be looking at these ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Fanatastic glasses. I was on vacation and the glasses ...
customer_reviews.text: Fanatastic glasses. I was on vacation and the glasses broke unexpectatly while clening the lenses. I contacted the manufacturer about my breakage and was told the glasses were under warranty. To my surprise the company worked with me and shipped me a new pair of sunglasses...no charge. Glasses were deleivered today and will be a Duduma shopper from now on. Thank you Duduma for the help and honoring your warranty!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Stieb

customer_reviews.title: Great value - no fogging, polarized, & low cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for road biking. They fit comfortably with my biking helmet, and are extremely lightweight. The polarized lenses worked very well, giving me great visibility of the road during an early morning ride into the sunrise. And the best part is that in spite of the cool morning with rapidly rising temps and humidity over 94%, these didn't fog up at all, like my previous sunglasses did. Definitely a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Little mum

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting sunglasses for low-nose bridge, narrow face
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting sunglasses for low-nose bridge (or Asian) profile, with a narrow face. These glasses don't rest or cut into my cheek bone. Perfectly wraps around my face blocking the sun. The nose pads tips rest on my nose bridge, without leaving an impression. The weight has a good feel, and it doesn't look or feel cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter playing softball, and they are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: S_T_N

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional product-Durable and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: First: Shiping was fast and communication first class. I knew when the product was shipped and expected delivery. Once I received the glasses I received a follow up email informing me of delivery and asking if there is anything else they could assist with. Second: The product is exactly as described. For a $20 pair of sunglasses they are very durable and compare to others at a higher price point. Pro: Durable. Fashionable. Wearable. Comfortable. Con: Feel a bit cheap but that should be expected given the price, although they have held up. Recommendation: I would suggest this product to others and would make another purchase. I coach high school baseball and recommend my players to buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Rick M

customer_reviews.title: Was a Great birthday gift for my wife.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for my wife. She loves these glasses. Light weight, stylish, and the view is great.
customer_reviews.author: jellylag

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Package smelled like cigarette smoke. It was horrible. Threw the glass case out. And washed the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Leilich

customer_reviews.title: The Duduma Designer glasses are good sun glasses for the money
customer_reviews.text: The Duduma Designer glasses are good sun glasses for the money. I wear them everyday while driving and they perform well. They're light weight, and they protect your eyes, so they do what sun glasses are made to do. Though I'm not much into cool anymore, they look cool.
customer_reviews.author: BHG

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for a reasonable price. I have recommended them to several friends and they all have been very happy. Anytime I catch them on the "value deals" I bury a pair. I currently have 3 pair.
customer_reviews.author: Vance O.

customer_reviews.title: The fit is comfortable for multiple activities
customer_reviews.text: The fit is comfortable for multiple activities. The lenses are sharp and clear; I live in AZ and am not a water person so I don't experience regular glare. I primarily use these glasses for running, walking and trail hiking...for the price point, I don't think I'll be going back to my Oakleys!
customer_reviews.author: AJNAZ

customer_reviews.title: Took a month before the smell went away, then broke after wearing twice.
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. The awful smell did go away after a month. When I finally got around to wearing them, one side broke halfway down on the 2nd day. Convenient that the return option is a month and it takes that long to get rid of the smell so you can actually wear them. Prior to them breaking, they seemed fine, but it's clear they are cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Spencer

customer_reviews.title: I am a week into these without and issue and they seem like the frame is tougher
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be reasonable well built. I have a big head and the panama jack glasses I bought in Ocean City cracked (yes the frame cranked) due to stress after 2 weeks. I am a week into these without and issue and they seem like the frame is tougher. Lets see in 4 months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, comfortable, well constructed!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned Oakley sunglasses throughout my Law Enforcement career. I can tell you, I’ve spent some serious dollars on those expensive products. I wish I would have come upon Duduma Polorized Sunglasses. They are very comfortable to wear. They’re tough, and can take a beating. And they cost less than $30 a pair. I strongly recommend purchasing a pair. You won’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Roger W Sonsini

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lens, very nice aesthetics; potentially uncomfortable nose pieces
customer_reviews.text: My primary riding glasses. Great quality optics, aesthetics are great, and they are very light. My only small complaint is the nose pieces feel like they could dig in a little, making red marks and discomfort. However, I've ridden my bike over 200 miles with these, and they disappear on my face, so the nose pieces aren't actually uncomfortable (likely because the glasses are so light). Overall A+.
customer_reviews.author: munkeePilot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect don’t pay for other same quality glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and look. The price was spot with the style and high quality polarized lenses. I’ve only had them a few weeks with a couple of outside runs. They don’t move when sweating. I’m hoping I get at least a few years out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Fit and Nice Lenses
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have a large nose bridge, and these adjustable nose pads enabled me to find the perfect sweet spot. Lenses are good thus far; however, I have not yet had to clean them. I hope they don't scratch when I use the supplied cleaning cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Mardi Gras

customer_reviews.title: Love these sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love these sunglasses. I play tennis and other sports and have always had problems with bright sun. These block the bright sun. They are dark so I cannot wear them on a non-sunny day. But they are exactly what I wanted. Oh they are also very comfortable...light weight and don't hurt my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Golf Girl

customer_reviews.title: The best shades I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have photophobia (eyes sensitive to light) and I was always buying shades, but I never quite got the design and feel that I wanted. I took a chance with these and after having them for 6 weeks, I can say that these are the best shades I've ever owned. Solid design, sturdy yet comfortable. Come with cleaning clothes, and case. Fits very well, you can go for a run and not worry about these shades slipping off or getting loose. Well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these fit. I also like the idea a lifetime guarantee against breaking. I often have problems with frames snapping and when they said the guaranteed them not to break it was worth checking them out. Also, the lenses are superior to most glasses I have worn including a pair of very high priced ones. So thank you for this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for the price and features
customer_reviews.text: These polarized sunglasses are an excellent buy for the price. My son is currently using them for baseball. He explained that they offered a substantial upgrade from his older non-polarized glasses. They are also much more flexible, an important aspect when using them for sports. I would highly recommend these glasses for the price and features.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Geat shades
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pair for my girls who play softball. They love them.
customer_reviews.author: Earl R.

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Got these on a lightning deal as cheap sunglasses for a beach trip. Really enjoyed wearing these and wear them now that I’m home. Excellent product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: A. S. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great cycling glasses. I purchased these for my brother. He loves them and stay put when he rides!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: I squint like crazy in the sun
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but I needed something for outdoor exercise. I squint like crazy in the sun, and my sunglasses didn't help. These got good reviews, so I tried them. I want to buy ten more, they work really well. I don't squint, I can see everything. SCIENCE!
customer_reviews.author: Marc Scheff

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Lasted just until I went on vacation on Cape Cod, and then the ear piece broke in half. I managed a temporary fix with duct tape but in my estimation this is junk. I didn't force it, it just fell apart when I put it on my head in the blinding sunshine of the beach.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Poltrack

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch, Study Construction, Sports Eyewear at a steal of a price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic Sports glasses. I tried them out for mountain biking because I can't justify spending $200 on something I KNOW I will destroy. These are premium made and separate the blues from the browns perfectly as well as diminish glare and make reading the trail at high speed easier. I would definitely recommend these and am going to buy another few pairs soon.
customer_reviews.author: Tessandori

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little glasses. They look good, feel good, and function good. They came with a hard case. As well as a soft case for storage. They are not $200 glasses, but at 1/10th the price the do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shades of summer
customer_reviews.text: Like these very nice comfortable fit good value too will match up to the more expensive Oakley etc
customer_reviews.author: ktm43

customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses for the price! My hubby loses them all the time so I don’t mind buying these every few months.
customer_reviews.author: Bob F.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and cost effective!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, affordable and effective. It is clearly able to filter our strong UV rays / white-light, which even my $110 oakley (2009 era) was not able to effectively do. I love this piece and even ordered another pair. Also, Black is the best, since there is no extra coating (for example, blue coating one peeled off due to nail scratch, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Saddy

customer_reviews.title: These glasses literally stink like burned plastic or smoke
customer_reviews.text: The odor is so strong I cant even stand to wear them and now my eyes are watering. I see 3 other reviews saying the exact same thing so it is a pattern. Washed them in soap and water multiple times but it did not help at all. Too bad as the style is very nice and the lenses look great. Clearly an obvious manufacturing failure but they sold them anyway, boo!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with good UV protection , also light weight . Arrived on time in good condition ..
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable soft nosepads. Fit and stay on my medium noggin. Very good optical clarity. Use as daily driver for work. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: rayb8888

customer_reviews.title: Clear vision, practical, and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and the fact that is light weight. Useful for rowing.
customer_reviews.author: Jalhan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't move at all when I run, provides excellent eye protection, and is very stylish. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cool & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Was impressed with the glasses. Nose piece is very comfortable and adjustable. Also really nice case and soft bag included with small cleaning rag! Can’t beat it for the price...
customer_reviews.author: Julia’s Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: I took these glasses for a kayaking trip. The polarized lenses worked great, I could see the fish in the river water. The gasses fit perfect, too, considering the fact that I have a wide face.
customer_reviews.author: Catheryn

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Love the sunglasses however the case never zipped up properly. Can I get a new case and send back the other on that was never used?
customer_reviews.author: linda bronfman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cools far. Hope they last, I am kind of rough on sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Byron D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I just had Lasik Eye Surgery and these glasses not only fit my face perfectly but the HD quality of the lens have really helped me with the sensitivity to light! These sunglasses are amazing. I work in law enforcement and I needed to get rid of the glasses to be able to wear shades. I'd recommend these to anyone who works outside on a regular basis. I wear them driving and inside all day. I bought another pair already.
customer_reviews.author: Liz NYC

customer_reviews.title: Don't pass these up
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost a month now and I own 4 pairs of Oakley's, which are obviously a lot more expensive, BUT these glasses are very good!!! I find myself wearing these more than the pricey brand and they fit my face very well. I'd highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Harris

customer_reviews.title: I bought them, used them and the bought some more
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed at the fit and finish of these sports glasses. Like them so much i bought 2 extra pairs. the fit me great
customer_reviews.author: Rene Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses, blocks the sun but also brightens things up. Look good on too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Blue

customer_reviews.title: They get the job done.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are sturdy-enough for long-term use. I really like the case and the little protection bag these come with, this will prevent the glasses from getting scratched up in my bag. The fit is snug for my tiny head ;-), dimensions are as advertised. The only regret is that these don't come with alternate shades. These are pretty dark. I use these for biking, mainly as windshield for my eyes, so if the day is not sunny or I bike at later hours, I would prefer to have an alternative in a lighter shade.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Kramida

customer_reviews.title: Gonna be great for fishing
customer_reviews.text: Honestly super comfortable and I can see great with the sun beating down. I bought these for fishing. I haven't gone fishing with them yet, but they are better polarized than other glasses I have, so they will do great.
customer_reviews.author: W1R3S

customer_reviews.title: Beach glasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses fit me very well and are great for the beach. I have a very hard face to fit so I'm usually hesitant to purchase sun glasses without trying them on first. But these are great. Come with a nice hard case. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Duduma Polarized Designer Fashion Sports Sunglasses for Baseball Cycling Fishing Golf Tr62 Superlight Frame
feature_bullets: TAC POLARIZED LENS- 100% UV400 protection coating, blocks 100% harmful UVA & UVB Rays. Restore true color, eliminate reflected light and scattered light and protect eyes perfectly. TAC lens includes 7 layers. The 1st layer is polarization layer. The 2nd and 3rd layers are bonding layers to enable durability. The 4th and 5th layers are UV protection layers to absorb UV light. The 6th and 7th layers are shatterproof layers.
PRODUCTS DIMENSION- Lens height:40 mm (1.57 inches); lens width:66mm (2.59 inches); leg length:140mm(5.51 inches); nose bridge:12-30 mm (0.47-1.18 inches); frame length: 140mm (5.51 inches).

GOOD LOOK, SUPERLIGHT, STYLISH, DURABLE AND CLEAR- Flattering lines & design features create aesthetically pleasing appearance. Lightweight design is ideal for motorcycle and cycling bicycle, driving, running, fishing, racing, skiing, climbing, trekking or other outdoor activities. Fashion and stylish design, with rich color combinations of frames and lens. Polycarbonate lens and frames are impact, scratch resistant and durable. Rimless jacket frame design enables clear lower vision field.
